message: Bob, I'm happy to offer you my product for $1,000,000. I know it's a valuable asset, but I'm motivated to sell it quickly.  Let me know your thoughts.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your offer.  $900,000 is a step in the right direction. I'm willing to come down to $950,000, but that's my absolute bottom line.  If you're serious about this, let me know.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $950,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $925,000. I'm confident we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
